snippet.title: My Zombie World - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
In My Zombie World you must infect all the humans in your sight, create your own horde of zombies and destroy everything in your path.

An adventure where you are the enemy!

In this atypical game you have the role of Zê Zumbi, you wake up next to your grave that has been desecrated by some thugs. As revenge for waking you up from your eternal sleep, you attack and infect them, making them to join your clan as zombies.

That is like you begins your great adventure where you will free imprisoned zombie friends, learn new skills and grow your small group of green beings into a gigantic horde to conquer the world.

Download the Android version now 😊
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sixtysevenbits.zombieworld

#zombiesurvival #stickmanvszombies #zombiegame
